main event: A civilian woman observed four unidentified flying objects performing erratic maneuvers over San Antonio, Texas on August 7, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as round, disc-shaped, and emitted a color similar to white-hot molten metal.,The objects appeared to be approximately 33 to 50 feet in diameter.,The observed speed of the objects was estimated to be between 600 to 1000 mph.,The objects were seen at altitudes ranging from 10,000 to 20,000 feet.,The sighting lasted for about 70 minutes with intervals of appearance and disappearance.
sighted object: four round, disc-shaped unidentified flying objects
